scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd apps/backend && npm run lint 2>/dev/null || echo 'No lint script in backend'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd apps/backend && npm test 2>/dev/null || echo 'No test script in backend'
scripts.test:frontend: cd apps/web && npm test 2>/dev/null || echo 'No test script in frontend'
